ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my netted armor (& gloves) from a nice dark elf enchantress for 2 plat because she had no use for them .  Ya just gotta shop around! ...
ygData.messageBody:
I got my netted armor (& gloves) from a nice dark elf enchantress for 2 plat
because "she had no use for them". Ya just gotta shop around!



>I have to agree with this .. Monks really do have the p*** taken out of
>them
>because everyone knows they need netted armour and upwards, but I have to
>say that I am yet to meet a fellow monk that shares the same thoughts. I
>managed to get myself a full set of netted from a troll for 4pp al that was
>missing was the gloves .. which I expected to pay up to 2pp for, even
>though
>I begrudge paying it .. Imagine my supprise when I auctioned for a pair and
>a fellow monk offered me some for "Oh the least I will take is 10pp" ..
>this
>was on Erollisi Marr server
>
>Perhaps an all monk guild would address this problem?
>
>Masafumi
